tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lead_management_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  lead_source VARCHAR(100),
  report_date DATE,
  lead_conversion_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE LeadReports (
    lead_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name VARCHAR(255),
    lead_source VARCHAR(255),
    lead_status VARCHAR(50),
    lead_created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE DashboardData (
    dashboard_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    dashboard_name VARCHAR(255),
    total_leads INT,
    conversion_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    revenue_generated DECIMAL(12,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Leads (
  lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_name VARCHAR(100),
  lead_source VARCHAR(50),
  lead_status VARCHAR(50),
  lead_owner INT,
  lead_created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_date DATE,
  activity_duration INT,
  activity_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(100),
  report_type VARCHAR(50),
  report_date DATE,
  report_data TEXT,
  report_generated_by INT
)

CREATE TABLE lead_management_reports (
  lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_name VARCHAR(255),
  lead_source VARCHAR(50),
  lead_status VARCHAR(20),
  lead_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE lead_activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_date DATE,
  activity_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE dashboard_widgets (
  widget_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  widget_name VARCHAR(100),
  widget_type VARCHAR(50),
  display_order INT,
  is_enabled BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE lead_management_performance (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name VARCHAR(50),
    lead_source VARCHAR(50),
    lead_status VARCHAR(20),
    lead_owner_id INT,
    lead_created_date TIMESTAMP,
    lead_updated_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE lead_owners (
    owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_name VARCHAR(50),
    owner_email VARCHAR(50),
    owner_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE lead_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date TIMESTAMP,
    activity_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE lead_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(50),
    report_type VARCHAR(20),
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE lead_dashboards (
    dashboard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dashboard_name VARCHAR(50),
    dashboard_type VARCHAR(20),
    dashboard_created_date TIMESTAMP
)
